sentences.english: A:Do you know about All Fools' Day?
sentences.chinese: 你知道愚人节是怎么回事台球？

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a billiard table with a level-adjusting device for sport and game.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种运动游戏用的台球桌。

sentences.english: Playing billiards was another favorite pastime for young people.
sentences.chinese: 打台球是一项年轻人喜爱的活动。

sentences.english: He was shooting pool with two other men.
sentences.chinese: 他在和另外两个男人打落袋台球。

sentences.english: What's the role of the billiard balls at all?
sentences.chinese: 那么台球的角色究竟是什么呢？

sentences.english: In the course of our research, we spoke with a number of professional snooker and billiards players.
sentences.chinese: 我们在研究中和几位职业斯诺克和台球运动员谈话。

sentences.english: It is like an elastic collision between billiard balls.
sentences.chinese: 就像是台球在，台球桌上发生弹性碰撞。

sentences.english: It is like an elastic collision between billiard balls.
sentences.chinese: 就像是台球在，台球桌上发生弹性碰撞。

sentences.english: He got full of gin and laid round Wright's poolroom all day.
sentences.chinese: 他灌了一肚子杜松子酒，在赖特台球室躺了一天。

sentences.english: The Kenilworth has a licensed bar and a dining area.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧区提供一台电视机和一个台球桌。

sentences.english: A young Chinese boy plays snooker in a Hutong, or a traditional alleyway in Beijing, China.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的老胡同里一小孩在玩着台球，中国。

sentences.english: He said snooker occupied all his life.
sentences.chinese: 他说，他的生活完全被台球占据了。

sentences.english: A piece of wood used to steady the cue in billiards.
sentences.chinese: 在台球中用球杆垂直撞击母球的动作。

sentences.english: Star snooker player Ding Junhui announced his comeback by winning his second UK Championship title.
sentences.chinese: 台球明星丁俊晖再次赢得英国锦标赛冠军，高调复出。

sentences.english: Swimming pool tips and news pool digging skills education video.
sentences.chinese: 游泳池和台球新闻线索钻教学技巧影片。

sentences.english: I am modeling them as billiard balls of a finite dimension.
sentences.chinese: 我把它们想象成具有有限尺寸的台球。

definition: table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
(ball game) enthusiast (player)/golf buddy (or tennis buddy etc)
